author: vhardy
msg: a. Added caching for color-profile so that if the same color-profile is
referenced multiple times, it is only loaded once.
b. Added color-profile support on Base64 images.
c. Abstracted Thomas' URLImageCache into a SoftReferenceCache (in xx.util)
that URLImageCache and NamedProfileCache (new) extend by offering
The modifications are validated by a new test: samples\tests\colorProfile.svg.

author: vhardy
msg: a. Added support for the <color-profile> tag referenced by both
b. Fixed stroke/fill-opacity issue (was previously ignored for
gradients and patterns. There is a new sample file that validates
c. New ProfileRed RenderedImage implementation to support color-profile
NOTE: There is not yet any caching done on profiles. This is on my todo
